name: AlpineAire Southwestern Style Masa With Beef
description: Set up camp and sit down to a tasty and easy to prepare corn meal seasoned with southwestern style spices with beef, pinto and black beans, cheddar cheese, brown rice and vegetables.Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add.Ingredients: cornmeal, beef diced cooked freeze dried (beef, salt), sharp cheddar cheese powder (pasteurized milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes, disodium phosphate, annatto extract), long grain parboiled brown rice, tomato powder, tomato flakes, pinto bean flakes, black bean flakes, sweet corn, white onion, corn flakes, monterey chili powder (chili pepper, spices, salt, garlic), green chili pepper, sea salt, chicken flavor broth low sodium [maltodextrin, salt, torula yeast, dehydrated vegetables (onion, celery, parsley, spinach, garlic, carrot), potato flour, xanthan gum, spices, extractives of spice (including turmeric and paprika), soy lecithin.  not more than 2% soybean oil added as a processing aid], garlic granulated, black pepper, cilantro, jalapeno.Allergens: contains soy and milk.No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy.Meals have a 5-year shelf life.
